name: Vivek Rai
aboutMsg: A passionate coder from MNNIT Allahabad in the India. I love to play with machine & deep learning models and always eager to learn new things.
achievements: Winner of Logical Rhythm Event (ML based) of Avishkar 2020 (MNNIT Allahabad).
Rank 20th (out of 2000+ participants) in Cascade Cupâ€™20 , a Data Science Hackathon organised by IIT GUWAHATI.

Second Runner Up in Softablitz Event of Avishkar 2018 (MNNIT Allahabad).
In Top 20 (out of 200+ teams) in Hack36 4.O , a premiere Hackathon of MNNIT Allahabad.
